Note to graders: Here is my submission, inspired by the hit indie game Little Nightmares.

  1. Textures — Wood Texture on the ground cube
  2. 3D Models — 9 Different GLB files from sketch fab (and many cardboard boxes)
  3. Controls — Orbital Controls
  4. Light — Ambient light, Directional light (center), and Point Lights (cardboard boxes)
  5. Skybox — Dark night sky filled with stars
  6. Wow point — The scene is intentionally crafted to be dark, antique, and horrific, like the original game. The cardboard boxes in front represent rays of hope, as they offer hiding spots to the monsters lurking in the darkness.
